txt_en: I want you to always, always, always pay attention to yourself first.
txt_cn: 永远把自己放在第一位。。

txt_en: Every star in the universe, we were going to see them all.
txt_cn: 我们要一起看遍宇宙繁星。

txt_en: I'm not concerned to the past, only the future.
txt_cn: 我不关心过去，只着眼于未来。

txt_en: We live and learn..
Freedom is about being yourself.
Everything has a price.
We can venture into the blackest night and shine a light on the darkness.
txt_cn: 走进黑暗的夜晚，并投下一束光。

txt_en: Winter is coming.
You sail the high seas. You go where nobody goes.
txt_cn: 你应遨游瀚海，征服无人之境。

txt_en: Life is full of sunshine and rainbows.
txt_cn: 生活中充满阳光和彩虹。

txt_en: My life is my life, my choices.
Make your own way.
A friend is a second self.
Every cloud has a silver lining.
Elegance is a journey.
Goodness comes from within.
We write our own story.
It's always darkest before the dawn.
Muse is everywhere.
No one can cage a man who truly wants to be free.
txt_cn: 没人能关住一个真心想获得自由的人。

txt_en: You're part of my life.
Do what comes naturally.
